name: The Secret of Barry Allen Trivia Quiz | DC Comics | 10 Questions

questions.text: Wally is married to reporter Linda Park. What does her note reveal?
options: She is off visiting her grandparents
She is going to kill herself.
questions.explanation:
She has left Wally.

	Wally had previously asked Hal Jordan to remove knowledge of his secret identity from everyone's minds. Unknowingly this also meant himself and his wife! The shock was too much for Linda, who left for a month to sort her thoughts out. She returns and all is well again.

questions.text: Mirror Master, Weather Wizard and Captain Cold are consulting with Doctor Alchemy, asking him to support them.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Doctor Alchemy is a colorful member of the Rogues, the collective name for villains that oppose The Flash. He can transmute elements by using the Philosopher's Stone.

questions.text: A handful of Rogues attack the parade honoring the Flash. Which other two speedsters help Flash?
questions.explanation:
Jay Garrick and Kid Flash.

	Jay Garrick was the first Flash; he's been fighting crime since the 1940's, using several methods to keep himself in shape! Kid Flash is Bart Allen, Barry Allen's grandson from the 30th century.

questions.text: The Justice League of America doesn't recall who Flash is! Which member of the team tries to catch him?
questions.explanation:
Superman.

	Superman and The Flash have raced a few times before, but this time Flash comes out on top. Flash refused to answer and instead drove himself nearly crazy looking for his wife.

questions.text: What drug is Mirror Master addicted to?
questions.explanation:
Cocaine.

	Captain Cold is tipped off when Mirror Master's nose starts to bleed, and later demands that he get clean. Just as there have been three Flashes over the years, three Mirror Masters have been there to challenge them.

questions.text: Double Down and Girder are hired by which villain?
questions.explanation:
Penguin.

	Oswald Cobblepot is commonly a Batman villain, but in this book he is looking to extend his criminal empire into Keystone City, Flash's hometown. All three are defeated by the Flash.

questions.text: Which villain do Flash and Nightwing encounter in the Flash museum?
questions.explanation:
Gorilla Grodd.

	Gorilla Grodd is a superstrong gorilla who comes from the hidden Gorilla City. Also very intelligent, Grodd thinks he should rule the world, but is beaten time and time again by the Flash.

questions.text: Captain Boomerang dies and passes the mantle on to his son. What is the difference between them?
options: The son refuses to wear the scarf
questions.explanation:
The son has superspeed.

	"Digger" Harkness was a down-on-his-luck villain who menaced the Flash in his better days. After he dies the name and equipment is passed on to his son, who can run quickly for short periods of time.

questions.text: Barry Allen tried to mentally change this villain.
questions.explanation:
The Top.

	Using Zatanna's magical powers, Flash gained an ally in the Top. Able to spin at fantastic speeds, Top was horrified at the bad things he had done as a villain and went crazy.

questions.text: Who took the body of Captain Boomerang?
questions.explanation:
The FBI.

	As the book ends we see that the FBI has taken the body and is keeping it for some unknown purpose. One character alludes to the corpse somehow helping them take down the Rogues once and for all.
